section.title: Leap.Unity.EnumEventTableEditor Class Reference

listitem.para: The enum event table is unable to properly display itself in the inspector, it instead must be constructed and used from within a custom editor. Pass in a serialized property pointing to the EnumEventTable, and the enum type used by the table.
